page.title: 05Employment - Hittisleigh
page.content: The majority of the population is concerned with farming in one form or another, dairy farming, market gardening, keeping horses, goats, bees, and one plant nursery. Others are employed in associated jobs, making gates and farm buildings, farm supplies, a milk round, and a concrete mixing firm. One imports reed for thatching, and there is a large quarantine and boarding kennels. Only 2 men are employed full-time, and 1 part-time as farm workers. Farms are largely run by the occupying family, and hired-in sub contractors at busy times
